banner.subtitle: Welcome to Our Portfolio
banner.title: Barq Design.
banner.description: We are a team of passionate designers and developers dedicated to crafting exceptional digital experiences. Our portfolio showcases our expertise in web design, development, and user experience.

about.paragraph1: Welcome in our creative space! We are passionate designers and developers dedicated to crafting unique digital experiences. Our team combines innovation, expertise, and attention to detail to help bring your ideas to life.
about.paragraph2: Whether you're a startup, a huge corporation, or an individual with a vision, we are here to collaborate and deliver solutions tailored to your needs. <1>Let's build something amazing together!</1>
about.paragraph3: Here are a few technologies we have been working with recently:

projects.title: Some Things I have Built
projects.buildSmart: BuildSmart Company specializes in innovative construction, planning, and design solutions. Their team delivers high-quality building projects, integrating modern technology and sustainable practices to ensure efficient project management and exceptional results from concept to completion.

contact.subtitle: 04. What's Next?
contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm currently open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you have a question or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out and I'll get back to you as soon as possible!
